news.title: Can a social app fix the ‘terrible devastation’ of social media?

news.summary: Shure is updating its MV88 microphone for the modern age by adding a USB-C connector for mounting directly to your smartphone. news.title: RGB is the next big thing in OLED gaming monitors

news.title: Mammotion’s flagship robot lawnmower now uses lidar to map your yard
news.summary: Mammotion is upgrading its flagship robotic lawnmower with its new lidar-equipped navigation system, allowing it to generate a live 3D map of your yard while it mows.
